prompt: An 80s synthwave track with a dark heavily-filtered synth lead playing a subdued melody over a punchy analog synth bass. A gated reverb snare cracks on the backbeat with that classic 80s tail. The high frequencies are rolled off and muffled, giving everything a warm murky character, like a worn VHS tape. Instrumental, no vocals.
